subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Football
lead_paragraph: Candlestick Park, home to the San Francisco 49ers and at one time the Giants, will be torn down. “It was a dump,” said a former 49ers wide receiver. “But it was our dump.”
snippet: Candlestick Park, home to the San Francisco 49ers and at one time the Giants, will be torn down. “It was a dump,” said a former 49ers wide receiver. “But it was our dump.”
